name: Alcotron
description:
Alcotron - 2D Platformer with only one level, but different mechanics.

You play as a Drunken Robot "Alcotron" stuck in the broken matrix. Every time when Alcotron drinks the gasoline , matrix goes out of control and changes the game rules.

Made for GMTK 2020.

  • Gamedesigner, Programmer - GroundDoon
  • Artist - turesiht
  • Sound - 3q
